May 11, 1912 D Oldham Quickstep Contest
Oldham Quickstep Contest 0 March Contest
oldham-quickstep-contest
None
Featherstall Road North, Oldham, Lancashire Chadderton Old originally finished 2nd but were later disqualified for rule infringement. Royton promoted from 3rd to 2nd.
6 bands competed.
Organised after Horse and Cycle Parade.
